Family Background: Schwarz Huber Fuchs and Sophia tied the knot in 1993. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1981, Schwarz graduated from Bundesgymnasium und Bundesrealgymnasium Mattersburg with a secondary school diploma.
After that, he went on to study at University of Salzburg until 1984.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 40 years, Schwarz Huber Fuchs brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
In 1985, Schwarz Huber Fuchs started working as a Family Office Manager at Julius Baer Gruppe AG, marking the beginning of his successful career.
At UBS AG, he held the position of Investment Director from 1987 to 1989, making significant contributions to the organization.
His tenure as a CFO at Lombard Odier Darier Hentsch & Cie from 1989 to 1990 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
He appointment as a COO at Credit Suisse AG in 1991 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Schwarz Huber Fuchs concluded his career as a CEO at Credit Suisse AG, where he worked from 1993 until retirement.
Wealth Summary:
